column4: Does anyone know what partitions require the most read speed on a hard disk? I have two hard disks, one is faster than the other, and I wanted to know which disk should hold which partition for the best read/write performance. Any ideas?
depends on what you plan to do. Are you planning on gaming?
Nah, some video/audio editing and everyday use.
if I were planning on doing video/audio editing I would want my storage partition to be on the faster drive.
